name: Ocean Park Pizza & Village Pub
address: Ocean Park Pizza, 12822 16 Ave, Surrey, BC V4A 1N4, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Tortellini
hasMenuItem.description: Cheese stuffed tortellini baked with your choice of Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's homemade garlic cream sauce, marinara, or meat sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Baked Lasagna
hasMenuItem.description: A classic. Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's own recipe of lasagna noodles, homemade meat sauce, and their blend of cheeses.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Souvlaki
hasMenuItem.description: A generous skewer of Villa Pub's flavourful marinated chicken breast.

hasMenuItem.name: “Famous” Greek Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh cucumbers, ripe tomatoes, green peppers, onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, all dressed with Ocean Park Pizza & Village Pub's signature dressing. Served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Wings (1 lb)
hasMenuItem.description: A full pound of crispy chicken wings tossed in your choice of salt and pepper, honey garlic, hot, barbeque, or teriyaki sauce. Served with ranch dip.

hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni and Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's perfect blend of cheeses.

hasMenuItem.name: L - Hawaiian Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Ham and pineapple.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh romaine tossed in Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's own caesar dressing, garlic croutons, and shredded parmesan. Served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.description: Mushroom, ham, pepperoni, green peppers, onions, shrimp, and olives.

hasMenuItem.description: Pepperoni and Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's perfect blend of cheeses.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Tenders
hasMenuItem.description: Lightly breaded juicy chicken strips. Served with dipping sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Appetizer Kalamari
hasMenuItem.description: A family favourite. Tender squid, lightly coated and topped with sweet red onions, served with homemade tzatziki.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Quesadilla
hasMenuItem.description: Flour tortilla shell stuffed with grilled chicken breast, bell peppers, onions, diced tomatoes, and Ocean Park Pizza & Village Pub's special blend of cheeses. Served with sour cream and salsa.

hasMenuItem.name: Spanakopita
hasMenuItem.description: Authentic family recipe of spinach, feta and filo. OPA! Served with tzatziki.

hasMenuItem.name: Baja Taco
hasMenuItem.description: Homemade salsa, diced cabbage, chipotle sauce, and your choice of grilled cajun chicken, or pan-seared cod served in a soft tortilla.

hasMenuItem.name: Yam Fries with Garlic Chipotle Dip
Seafood Caps
hasMenuItem.description: Plump mushroom caps stuffed with real crab, shrimp, herbs, cream cheese, and baked to perfection. Served with garlic toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Coconut Beer Prawns with Sweet Chilli Sauce

hasMenuItem.name: Mandarin Spring Salad

hasMenuItem.name: Beet Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh mixed greens, Canadian goat cheese, candied walnuts, and Ocean Park Pizza & Village Pub's orange vinaigrette dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Warm Seafood Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh tomatoes and mixed greens drizzled with Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's homemade balsamic dressing. Topped with grilled wild salmon, scallops, jumbo prawns, and mussels.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: In-house breaded chicken breast fried to a golden crisp, topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise.

hasMenuItem.name: Village Burger (7 oz)
hasMenuItem.description: A juicy seven-ounce beef burger topped with melted cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, red onions, pickles, and Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's signature sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Canuck Burger (7 oz)
hasMenuItem.description: Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's seasoned seven-ounce beef burger topped with Canadian cheddar, bacon, red onions, ketchup, and mustard.

hasMenuItem.name: “Mad Greek” Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled chicken breast with ripe tomatoes, red onions, cucumbers, feta, and a creamy sun-dried tomato spread.

hasMenuItem.description: Ocean Park Pizza & Villa Pub's seasoned seven-ounce beef burger fully loaded with sautéed mushrooms, bacon, Swiss cheese, and all the trimmings.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetable patty loaded with ripe tomatoes, crisp lettuce, and red onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Crescent Beach Beef Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Slow roasted and thinly sliced roast beef piled high on French bread with hot beef au jus.

review.reviewBody:
Awesome!!
Always Fantastic 
food is Perpared Perfectly  and is always Fresh!!
Thank You
OP!!!

The Thai Bites were so good! We order from this place a lot and we Ive their pizza and appies. Their pasta isn't the best pasta I've ever had but it certainly does hit the spot. I would recommend the creamy tortellini or the Thai Stir Fry. The Parmesan Truffle Fries are also our fave.

My order arrived very quickly with Door Dash and the pizza was fantastic! I think I ordered the classic 3: pepperoni, mushrooms and green peppers, New York  style (pep on top) and added some olives. Simple but somehow Ocean Park make it one of the best you've ever had! Highly recommend.
Th baked tortellini with the garlic cream sauce is the best. It's my go  to whenever I order from here.
